title: Decagon scales personalized customer support with Claude \ Anthropic

metadata.title: Decagon scales personalized customer support with Claude \ Anthropic
metadata.description: Discover how Decagon uses Claude to power AI agents that deliver 24/7 white-glove customer service, reducing over-inferencing by 70% while increasing satisfaction for both B2B and B2C companies.
